channel.title: Mains on Italian Metabolomics Network
channel.description: Recent content in Mains on Italian Metabolomics Network

item.title: Join us!
item.description: The Italian Metabolomics Network (IMN) aims at bringing together people with different backgrounds actively working in the field of metabolomics, and, more broadly, in the study of metabolism. The objective is to promote networking, by offering opportunities for discussion, collaboration, training and exchanges between the participants.
